name: Net2ez
overview: Leading social networks, enterprises, finance, content companies, and communications service providers rely on Net2EZ for uninterruptable operation to support their mission critical application. With strategic footprint and access to key network interconnection points in North America, Net2EZ Managed Network Services provide site diversity and redundancy for your application. Net2EZ data centers are expressly designed to meet or exceed the most stringent requirements of uninterruptable operation of most demanding high power and high-density systems. Since 2006, we have achieved 100% availability through continued adherence to our principal philosophy to serve our customers with uncompromising quality with best in class data centers. The company is headquartered in Los Angeles, and it is privately held with strong profitable financial performance.
